column5: My bro picked up a boat last fall and wants to get a boat lift for it... used if possible.His boat is a 19'5" fibreglass bowrider, weighs around 2100 lbs or so. Manual lift preferred, but powered ok too. Canopy would be a bonus. Anyone have a contact for a good deal?ThanksPete
Naylor or RJ Machine are two local companies, perhaps they have used ones?
I should have mentioned, he would prefer used if possible. The Naylors are nice.
Might be worth looking down South if you don't mind the trip to pick it up. Seen quite a few on CL in Florida when I was boat shopping.
He's been scouring Kijiji for weeks... Lots are popping up but they either sell so fast he misses them, or they are really far away...  Was just PM'ed a promising local (Kawarthas) lead...
